price: 122. Tango biteni mibale okati ya lisanga na bino bakani kozonga sima. Mpe Allah nde azali mosungi wa bango, mpe epai na Allah nde esengeli na bandimi kotia elikia na bango.
arabic: إِذۡ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمۡ أَن تَفۡشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَاۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh hammat ṭāifatāni minkum an tafshalā wal-lahu waliyyuhumā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
